DATABASE_URL.description: Main process (or domain) Postgres database url.

CREATE_TOKEN.description: A secret key for creating new password.

GET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for reading all password.

DELETE_TOKEN.description: A secret key for deleting password.

ADMIN_TOKEN.description: A secret key for admin page login.

REFRESH_TOKEN.description: A secret key for refresh and get newest data from database.

CODE_GENERATE_TOKEN.description: A secret key for generating html code.

RED_COLOR.description: Red color value in RGB. From 0 to 255.

GREEN_COLOR.description: Green color value in RGB. From 0 to 255.

BLUE_COLOR.description: Blue color value in RGB. From 0 to 255.

MAX_WATERMARK.description: Maximum number of watermarks. Integer value

PASSWORD_LENGTH.description: Length of password. Integer value, max value is 50, min value is 1
